title: Do you have a dream?
body:
I want to go next level. Worlds. Are you the same as me? Are you willing to dedicate every spare second to working towards that goal?

Do you believe you can make it?
If you do and can then apply. 

Surgical

replies.body: I can get you as far as bronze 2 but after that you are on your own.
I can take over from there to Silver III
I want to be but im not good enough still add me
